channel.title: credentials on Drupal | IT Quicktasks
channel.description: Recent content in credentials on Drupal | IT Quicktasks

item.title: Change drupal user credential
item.description: Go to drupal root, then: drush upwd --password="newPassword_here" "the_user" More info in https://www.drupal.org/node/44164

item.title: DB Credentials via Drush
item.description: Go to drupal root, then: drush st --show-passwords database In drush 9.7.2 (may also work for other sub-versions of drush 9), the following command should be used: drush st DB
